<image_01> Describe the video in detail

The video appears to be a segment from an exercise or fitness instructional series, focusing on the proper technique for performing a specific core-strengthening movement. The individual in the video is demonstrating how to execute this move correctly by showing the correct form and posture required.

In the first frame, the person is seen sitting with their back against a dark background, wearing blue shorts. They are positioned with one leg bent and the other extended, holding their torso upright while keeping their head and shoulders close together.

By the second frame, the person has transitioned into a more advanced position, lying down on their side with their legs bent and feet flat on the ground. Their arms are placed under their head, supporting their upper body as they lift their hips off the floor, creating a bridge-like shape with their body.

Throughout both frames, there is text overlay at the bottom of the screen providing additional guidance in English and Chinese, suggesting that the viewer can adjust their pelvis during the exercise for better positioning. This indicates that the video aims to educate viewers on the importance of proper alignment and technique in physical exercises.

Classify the text into actions, such as falling, lying, squatting, jumping, etc.
